citation.case_name: Capetillo v. Dretke, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division

html:
544 U.S. 901

CAPETILLO
v.
DRETKE, DIRECTOR, TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF CRIMINAL JUSTICE, CORRECTIONAL INSTITUTIONS DIVISION.

No. 03-8067.

Supreme Court of United States.

March 7, 2005.

1

C. A. 5th Cir. Reported below: 71 Fed. Appx. 348. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted, judgments vacated, and cases remanded for further consideration in light of Roper v. Simmons, 543 U.S. 551 (2005).
